source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000010_MERLWYB<tab>Friends. 'Tis good to see you safe and well. I will admit, I had not counted on you seeking─let alone finding─refuge within the Holy See, but full glad was I to learn that you had.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000010_MERLWYB<tab>Freunde, wie schön, euch wiederzusehen. Ich hatte Sorge, wie man euch in Ishgard empfangen würde ... doch war ich erfreut zu hören, dass ihr dort Zuflucht gefunden habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thankfully, we had allies there who took us under their wing. And theirs was not the only aid we received, I suspect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir erhielten Hilfe von neuen Verbündeten. Doch ich vermute, dass uns noch von anderer Seite Unterstützung zuteil wurde ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>When we fled Ul'dah, we fully expected to become wanted men, known to all and hounded at every turn. Yet that did not come to pass. On the contrary, 'twould seem the charges against us have not been made public. Might we have you to thank for that, Admiral?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nach dem Anschlag auf die Sultana rechneten wir damit, von jedermann gejagt zu werden. Aber dem war nicht so - es scheint, als wären die An<var 16 /var>schuldi<var 16 /var>gungen nicht publik gemacht worden. Sicher hattet Ihr Eure Hände im Spiel?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000040_MERLWYB<tab>Sharp as ever, Master Alphinaud. On Marshal Tarupin's urging, the Elder Seedseer and I demanded that the Syndicate suppress news of the Scions' alleged crimes until such time as irrefutable evidence could be found.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000040_MERLWYB<tab>Alphinaud, dir kann man nichts vormachen. Ja, Oberst Pipin hat sich persönlich an mich gewandt. Kan-E-Senna und ich haben daraufhin ein paar ... Maßnahmen ergriffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000050_MERLWYB<tab>Our argument was simple: lacking proof, to accuse the saviors of the realm of so unlikely a crime would have the people up in arms. In their wisdom, the Syndicate agreed, as you yourself have seen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000050_MERLWYB<tab><var 08 E905 ((Die Kriegerin)) ((Den Krieger)) /var> des Lichts und den Bund der Morgenröte, die Eorzea vor so vielen Gefahren bewahrten, ohne überzeugende Beweise als Täter zu verurteilen, hätte das Volk gespalten - also folgte man unserem Rat, mit einer Anklage zu warten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000060_MERLWYB<tab>There is something you should know. Some few days prior to the banquet, the Elder Seedseer and I were summoned for a private audience with the sultana.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000060_MERLWYB<tab>Es gibt etwas, das du wissen musst. Die Älteste Saatseherin und ich besuchten die Sultana vor der Siegesfeier, auf ihre persönliche Einladung hin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000070_MERLWYB<tab>There, she revealed her intent to announce her abdication, that she might pave the way for the establishment of an Ul'dahn republic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000070_MERLWYB<tab>Sie offenbarte uns ihre Absicht, „aus der Herrschaft des Adels eine Herrschaft des Volkes zu machen“ - wie sie es ausdrückte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>What? But such an announcement would have plunged the entire nation into chaos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Solch eine radikale Änderung wird weder den Royalisten noch den Republikanern gefallen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000090_MERLWYB<tab>She was well aware of that. 'Twas for fear of what might ensue that she summoned us. Her Grace wanted the Elder Seedseer and I to lend Raubahn a helping hand, you see─to aid him in preserving the peace during the transition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000090_MERLWYB<tab>Sehr richtig. Die Sultana sah voraus, dass es zu einer Destabilisierung kommen könnte, und bat uns um Unterstützung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>So...having somehow caught wind of her plan, Lolorito and Teledji plotted the sultana's assassination in the hope of maintaining the constitutional status quo...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sollte jemand von ihrem Vorhaben erfahren und versucht haben, es mit dem Attentat zu verhindern? Die Republikaner, weil sie dachten, dass ihnen sonst die Macht aus den Händen gleiten würde?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>But they must have known that her death would sow as much chaos as her abdication─chaos from which Teledji alone might feasibly stand to profit. Surely Lolorito would never knowingly─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber jedem müsste doch bewusst sein, dass der Tod der Sultana das Land genauso ins Chaos stürzen würde wie ihre Abdankung ... Chaos, aus dem allerhöchstens Teledji einen Vorteil ziehen könnte. Aber Lolorito würde doch wohl nicht zulassen, dass sein schlimmster Rivale ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah. Could it be...? I dare not hope...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Könnte es sein, dass die Sultana noch ...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>The Ul'dahn authorities have yet to announce the sultana's passing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Das Sultanat hat bislang keine offizielle Erklärung abgegeben, dass die Sultana verstorben sei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000140_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>To allay any suspicion that may arise from Her Grace's absence, they have issued a statement to the effect that she is presently convalescing from illness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000140_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Ihre Abwesenheit bei Staatsgeschäften wird lediglich mit „ihrem gesund<var 16 /var>heit<var 16 /var>lichen Zustand“ erklärt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000150_MERLWYB<tab>Mayhap they're waiting for a fitting moment to break the news. Or mayhap they know of some other reason to delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000150_MERLWYB<tab>Dass ihr Tod noch nicht offiziell bekanntgegeben wurde, kann allerlei Gründe haben ... Aber dennoch ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Something else has been bothering me, Admiral. I was dismayed to learn that General Raubahn is to be executed─yet upon hearing the news, I could not help but wonder why he had been kept alive for so long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Da ist noch etwas, Admiral ... Ich war zwar schockiert, von der bevorstehenden Exekution General Raubahns zu hören - doch fragte ich mich, warum sie damit bis jetzt gewartet haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pray mistake not my meaning─I am, of course, overjoyed that our friend still draws breath, and that he might yet be saved. But if his enemies truly wished to eliminate him, they could have done so immediately. I see no reason for this delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wenn man ihn einfach nur von der politischen Bildfläche verschwinden lassen wollte, hätte man die Strafe auch direkt nach seiner Festnahme vollstrecken können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000180_MERLWYB<tab>Aye... You've struck upon an important point, Master Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000180_MERLWYB<tab>Ein berechtigter Einwand, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000190_MERLWYB<tab>Following his capture, Raubahn had been held in the Marasaja Pit within Ul'dah. In recent days, however, he has reportedly been moved to an unknown location.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000190_MERLWYB<tab>Nach seiner Festnahme wurde Raubahn lange in der Marasaja-Strafanstalt in Ul'dah festgehalten, doch vor kurzem wurde er an einen unbekannten Ort verlegt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000200_MERLWYB<tab>Queerly, 'twas not the Brass Blades who spirited him away, either, but a band of soldiers decked in blue...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000200_MERLWYB<tab>Und man sagt, dass er nicht von den Messingklingen, sondern von Soldaten in blauen Uniformen fortgebracht wurde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Crystal Braves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Kristallstreiter!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000220_MERLWYB<tab>Aye. If I read the winds aright, the arrangement between Lord Lolorito and the Braves has come under strain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000220_MERLWYB<tab>Ja. Und wenn ich die Zeichen richtig deute, so ziehen Republikaner und Kristallstreiter wohl nicht mehr so einhellig an einem Strang.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000230_MERLWYB<tab>At any rate, if we're to rescue Raubahn, we'll have to find him first. And you'll be glad to hear that I have already entrusted the task to those best able to see it done─our friends of Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_000230_MERLWYB<tab>Wie auch immer - wenn wir Raubahn retten wollen, müssen wir zuerst herausfinden, wohin er gebracht wurde. Ich habe bereits jemanden auf die Fährte angesetzt: unsere Freunde aus Doma.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100010_YUGIRI<tab>Pray forgive me my lateness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100010_YUGIRI<tab>Entschuldigt meine Verspätung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Yugiri!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yugiri!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100030_YUGIRI<tab>Master Alphinaud. I am pleased to see that the light of resolve shines in your eyes once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100030_YUGIRI<tab>Wie ich sehe, ist der Kampfgeist in deine Augen zurückgekehrt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, yes... How pathetic I must have seemed to you when we last met. I am ashamed to recall it. For a time I was well and truly lost. But with the aid of my comrades, I have since refound my purpose, and I shall take care not to misplace it again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du hast mich in einer dunklen Stunde getroffen ... Doch meine Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung war nur von kurzer Dauer. Mein Mut ist zurückgekehrt - dank der treuen Freunde an meiner Seite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100050_YUGIRI<tab>Since your escape from Ul'dah, my fellow shinobi and I have shadowed the Crystal Braves' every step in hopes of learning the Scions' whereabouts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100050_YUGIRI<tab>Seit eurer Flucht aus Ul'dah haben wir die Kristallstreiter auf Schritt und Tritt beschattet, in der Hoffnung, dass sie uns zu euren vermissten Kameraden führen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100060_YUGIRI<tab>Regrettably, our investigation has yet to yield any useful information. Pray forgive us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100060_YUGIRI<tab>Leider haben wir keine Spur von Minfilia und den anderen ... Es tut mir leid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100070_ALPHINAUD<tab>You need not apologize, my lady─we are grateful for all that you have done on our behalf. Besides, Raubahn is no less a friend, and we cannot well abandon him to his fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich danke euch für eure Bemühungen. Zuerst wollen wir uns um Raubahn kümmern - auch er ist ein Freund und sein Leben ist in Gefahr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100080_YUGIRI<tab>Hozan─the three of us shall attend to the Flame General's rescue. Pray draw away the guards by the entrance. Take Doware and Higiri with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100080_YUGIRI<tab>Hozan! Wir drei befreien den Phönixgeneral. Lock du die Wachen vom Eingang weg - nimm Doware und Higiri mit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100090_YUGIRI<tab>With me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_100090_YUGIRI<tab>Kommt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200010_ILBERD<tab>This changes nothing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200010_ILBERD<tab>Ihr hier?! Was wollt ihr jetzt noch ändern?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200020_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is over, Ilberd! Lay down your arms and surrender yourself to justice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das Spiel ist aus, Ilberd. Leg deine Waffe nieder und ergib dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200030_ILBERD<tab>Justice!? Justice for what exactly? 'Twas not I who assassinated the sultana, boy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200030_ILBERD<tab>Nicht bevor ich eure Hälse in einen Galgenstrick gesteckt habe, ihr Giftmischer und Mörder!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ere we debate who is responsible for the assassination, I would ask whether an assassination took place at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mörder sagst du, doch hat es überhaupt einen Mord gegeben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200050_ILBERD<tab>Clever little shite...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200050_ILBERD<tab>Du verfluchter kleiner Klugschwätzer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200060_ILBERD<tab>If you think you fight for justice, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, you'd best wake up. The truth is, you fight for whoever bloody well tells you to. Can you not see you're being used!? By the Scions, the city<var 1F /var>states, even the Crystal Braves. They none of 'em care a whit what you want─only what you can do for them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200060_ILBERD<tab>Und du - merkst du eigentlich gar nicht, wie dich jeder ausnutzt? Der Bund, die Stadt<var 16 /var>staaten, sogar die Kristallstreiter. Sie alle spannen dich nur für ihre Zwecke ein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200070_ILBERD<tab>And how do I know this? Because I'm the same─a pawn to be used as my masters see fit. All I ever wanted was to liberate my homeland, and I ate dirt to make it happen. But what have I achieved after all these years in servitude? Nothing! Not a bloody thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200070_ILBERD<tab>Du bist eine Figur in einem großen Spiel - genau wie ich. Ala Mhigo wollte ich befreien ... Doch was habe ich erreicht? Nichts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200080_ILBERD<tab>If we ourselves are not free─free to think and to act─how are we ever to reclaim our homeland? Know this: there is nothing I would not give to take back Ala Mhigo! NOTHING!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200080_ILBERD<tab>Wenn wir nicht frei sind, in Gedanken und Taten, wie sollen wir dann unsere Heimat zurückgewinnen? Und glaub mir, ich würde alles tun, um Ala Mhigo zu befreien - Alles!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>You'll not get away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du entkommst uns nicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200100_YUGIRI<tab>No, Master Alphinaud. Now is not the time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_200100_YUGIRI<tab>Nein, Alphinaud, jetzt ist nicht die Zeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300010_RAUBAHN<tab>I'm but a cripple and a fool, and still you came for me... I'm in your debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300010_RAUBAHN<tab>Ein Narr bin ich - und ein Krüppel obendrein. Und doch seid ihr gekommen, um mich zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300020_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are all of us fools of fate, General. But even fools have a part to play.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wenn es hier einen Narren zu beklagen gibt, dann mich. Aber selbst Narren haben ihre Rolle im Spiel des Schicksals zu erfüllen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_Q1_000_1<tab>What will you say to Raubahn?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_Q1_000_1<tab>Was möchtest du Raubahn sagen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_A1_000_1<tab>We stand with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_A1_000_1<tab>Wir stehen dir bei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_A1_000_2<tab>On your feet, gladiator. This fight is not over.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_A1_000_2<tab>Auf die Beine, Gladiator! Der Kampf ist noch nicht vorbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300030_RAUBAHN<tab>Rest assured, I was not planning to die till I'd avenged the sultana... Still, your words are welcome, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300030_RAUBAHN<tab>Danke. Ich wollte ohnehin nicht ruhen, bis die Sultana gerächt ist, und deine Worte geben meinem Herzen die dazu nötige Kraft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300040_RAUBAHN<tab>Know this, Ilberd... There is nothing I would not give to see you pay for what you've done. My wealth, my arm, my life...nothing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300040_RAUBAHN<tab>Ilberd ... Ich werde dich finden und dann wirst du büßen - selbst, wenn es mich meinen zweiten Arm kosten sollte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300050_ALPHINAUD<tab>General─are you aware that Lord Lolorito has yet to announce the sultana's death to the public?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300050_ALPHINAUD<tab>General ... Man hat den Tod der Sultana noch nicht publik gemacht. Findet Ihr das nicht seltsam?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300060_RAUBAHN<tab>...What? No. No, I was not aware of that─nor of anything else outside my cell. 'Tis passing strange, though... I assumed the bastard would make it known at the first opportunity and set about tearing down the sultanate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300060_RAUBAHN<tab>Was? Ich war mir sicher, dass Lolorito ihren Tod sofort in alle Welt hinausposaunen würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300070_ALPHINAUD<tab>As did we all. And it is indeed strange that he did not─strange or perhaps revealing? Now, I have no conclusive proof, nor do I wish to give you false hope...but I have reason to believe that Her Grace may yet live.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es ist bisher nur Spekulation, aber es könnte ja auch sein, dass ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300080_RAUBAHN<tab>What? But how can that be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300080_RAUBAHN<tab>... dass sie noch lebt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300090_YUGIRI<tab>Forgive me, friends, but it is not safe here. Let us continue this conversation without.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_300090_YUGIRI<tab>Ich störe nur ungern, aber - es ist hier nicht sicher. Lasst uns verschwinden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400010_URIANGER<tab>My dearest friends! Praise be unto the Twelve for delivering you from the clutches of treachery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400010_URIANGER<tab>Freunde ...! Wie bin ich froh, euch wohlauf zu sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400020_PIPPIN<tab>Father!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400020_PIPPIN<tab>Vater!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400030_RAUBAHN<tab>Pipin, my son... And Master Papashan besides...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400030_RAUBAHN<tab>Pipin, mein Sohn! Und Papashan, du auch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400040_PIPPIN<tab>Forgive me, Father... I should have been at Her Grace's side...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400040_PIPPIN<tab>Vater, vergib mir ... Ich hätte da sein sollen, um die Sultana zu retten ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400050_DEWLALA<tab>(-???-)Save your tears. The sultana yet lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400050_DEWLALA<tab>(-???-)Spar dir deine Tränen. Die Sultana lebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400060_RAUBAHN<tab>You...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400060_RAUBAHN<tab>Du ...!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400070_DEWLALA<tab>(-???-)It was I who arranged this gathering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400070_DEWLALA<tab>(-???-)Ja, ich war es, die dieses Treffen arrangierte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400080_DEWLALA<tab>And judging by your perplexed expressions, it would seem introductions are in order. I am Dewlala, head of the Order of Nald'thal, and member of the Syndicate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400080_DEWLALA<tab>Ich hatte noch nicht mit allen das Vergnügen - ich bin Dewlala, Hohepriesterin des Ordens von Nald'thal und Mitglied des Scor<var 16 /var>pio-Krei<var 16 /var>ses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400090_RAUBAHN<tab>What you said about the sultana─is it true? Is she alive?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400090_RAUBAHN<tab>Ist es wahr?! Lebt die Sultana?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400100_DEWLALA<tab>Young <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var>─I understand you were with the sultana when she drank from the poisoned goblet and collapsed. Would I be correct in assuming that you did not personally verify Her Grace's vital signs?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400100_DEWLALA<tab>Soweit ich weiß, warst du bei der Sultana, als sie aus dem vergifteten Kelch trank und zusammenbrach. Aber ihren Herzschlag hast du nicht überprüft. Ist das richtig?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400110_RAUBAHN<tab>Why ask, when 'tis plain you know the answer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400110_RAUBAHN<tab>Aber Ilberd hat doch selbst gesagt ...! Nun erklär dich schon!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400120_DEWLALA<tab>Calm yourself, General, and let me finish. The truth is not as you imagine it. You are all victims of a most ingenious ruse─a ruse conceived to eliminate the threat posed by Teledji Adeledji.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400120_DEWLALA<tab>Beruhigt Euch, General. Dies alles war Teil des Plans ... eines Plans, um Teledji Adeledji und die Bedrohung, die von ihm ausging, auszuschalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400130_DEWLALA<tab>'Tis my belief that Teledji plotted the sultana's assassination alone, but that Lolorito caught wind of his plot, and exploited it to his own ends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400130_DEWLALA<tab>Ich vermute, dass Teledji das Attentat auf die Sultana zunächst allein plante, doch Lolorito bekam irgendwie Wind davon und nutzte es zu seinem Vorteil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400140_DEWLALA<tab>He sought to manipulate you into eliminating Teledji for him, and you duly obliged. At one fell swoop, he removed his two foremost rivals, all the while remaining above suspicion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400140_DEWLALA<tab>Er wollte erreichen, dass du ihm Teledji aus dem Weg räumst - und du hast es tatsächlich getan. Mit einem Streich entledigte er sich zweier seiner Rivalen, ohne den geringsten Verdacht auf sich zu ziehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400150_RAUBAHN<tab>Gods strike me down for a fool... But the sultana─how can it be that she lives?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400150_RAUBAHN<tab>Lolorito, du Hund ... Aber wieso sollte die Sultana noch am Leben sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400160_DEWLALA<tab>She lives because Lolorito willed it. Her own lady-in-waiting is but one of his many little birds; by her sleight of hand, the poison was switched for a less deadly draft before it could reach her mistress's lips.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400160_DEWLALA<tab>Sie lebt, weil es Lolorito so passt. Eine ihrer Dienerinnen gehorchte Lolorito aufs Wort - und tauschte das Gift im letzten Moment aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400170_URIANGER<tab>Some manner of sedative, perchance...of a potency sufficient to induce a slumber like unto death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400170_URIANGER<tab>Gegen einen Trank, der einen Sandling lediglich in einen tiefen, todesähnlichen Schlaf versetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400180_DEWLALA<tab>Were I to guess, I would say Her Grace is being held somewhere, dreaming dreams of a brighter Ul'dah, even as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400180_DEWLALA<tab>Es ist nicht auszuschließen, dass die Sultana immer noch in diesem unnatürlichen Schlafzustand gehalten wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400190_RAUBAHN<tab>Oh, Nanamo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400190_RAUBAHN<tab>Oh, Nanamo ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400200_RAUBAHN<tab>I will never forgive Lolorito for his part in this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400200_RAUBAHN<tab>Aber Lolorito, diesem miesen Usurpator, werde ich niemals verzeihen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400210_DEWLALA<tab>Though Lolorito's hands are far from clean, they did pluck Her Grace from the jaws of death. That must count for something.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400210_DEWLALA<tab>Er ist gewiss kein Wohltäter, aber in diesem Fall hat er das Leben der Sultana gerettet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400220_DEWLALA<tab>And though one may call the man's methods into question, it cannot be denied that he knows the value of stability─to the very gil, like as not. He craves power, 'tis true, but he has no desire to depose the sultana.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400220_DEWLALA<tab>Er ist ein durchtriebener Intrigant, doch er kennt den Wert der Stabilität. Sein Hunger nach Reichtum und Macht ist unstillbar - nach einem Umsturz trachtet er indes aber nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400230_DEWLALA<tab>I had never taken sides in your feud with the Monetarists, but it was not for want of concern for our nation's welfare. Indeed, 'twas out of the desire to see order restored that I furnished your Far Eastern friends with information, and arranged this gathering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400230_DEWLALA<tab>Ich bleibe in politischen Dingen neutral, aber nicht aus Mangel an Sorge um unser Land. Es war mein Wunsch nach Frieden, der mich dazu brachte, Eure Freunde mit Informationen zu versorgen und Eure Rückkehr zu erwarten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400240_DEWLALA<tab>I hope you are ready to work, General, for there is much work to be done. Our first priority must be to bring matters back into balance. Lest you forget Her Grace's words, the true wealth of Ul'dah lies in the health, happiness, and hopes of her people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400240_DEWLALA<tab>Raubahn, es gibt viel zu tun. Zuerst müssen wir das Volk beruhigen. Denn der Wohlstand Ul'dahs liegt in der Gesundheit, dem Glück und den Hoffnungen seiner Bürger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400250_DEWLALA<tab>As for the more worldly kind of wealth, I am content to let Lolorito help himself to whatever Teledji Adeledji left behind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400250_DEWLALA<tab>Soll Lolorito doch zusammenkratzen, was Teledji Adeledji an Reichtum zurückgelassen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400260_DEWLALA<tab>You, meanwhile, must do that which you alone can do: rescue Her Grace and take your place at her side once more. For her sake...and that of our nation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03002_400260_DEWLALA<tab>Aber Ihr, General, habt eine Aufgabe, die Euer würdig ist: Rettet die Sultana und nehmt Euren Platz an ihrer Seite ein. Zu ihrem Wohl und zum Wohl unseres Landes.
